title.label: Actually such a fun game! (please read) :)

content.label: I stumbled across this game on steam back in the beginning of 2019 and was actually completely unaware of there being a mobile version. After playing the steam version I went into the mobile version with high expectations and was not disappointed at all! Definitely my favorite tycoon game. In addition, the realistic story is both interesting and informative. I actually have a video game history course in college right now (no that‚Äôs not a lie apparently video game history courses are a real thing) and there were a lot of things the professor asked that I was able to answer simply because I played this game, so props to Greenheart Games for making such a good game! :)

There are a lot of awesome things about this game it‚Äôs ease of access it‚Äôs replayability it‚Äôs variety but it‚Äôs really just an amazing game to sit down and play and lose yourself in. This game really is just a huge time killer we can spend hours and hours and hours trying to make a perfect 10 out of 10 game only to get that 9 The end. I have over 100 hours on the PC version and I‚Äôm sure I have 15 to 20 here on my iPad already. I can‚Äôt recommend this game enough.
Starts off enjoyable enough but the targets for ‚Äúgood‚Äù are way to hard to achieve. Gets frustrating.  Day 1 loved it but day 3 I think I‚Äôm done.

This is probably the first mobile game that I‚Äôve reviewed that I truly could not put down. I played it for five hours in the first session. I‚Äôm not exactly a gamer myself, but I loved exploring the nuances of what makes a successful game: timing, marketing, knowing your audience and genre, and more. I like that the game touches on social issues such as piracy and illegal fan games. This is probably the most fun I‚Äôve ever had learning about what it takes to be great in an industry.

And no ads or in app purchases. It‚Äôs just a great game!

This game is AMAZING! It really shows you how games are developed. In addition to that, the creativity options in this game are amazing. Whenever you make a good game you are rewarded which really makes you feel like you accomplished something. However, a bad game penalizes you in a very user friendly way. It shows you what you did wrong so that you can improve it later. You may lose money and a few fans but nothing a good game wouldn‚Äôt fix. This game is extremely balanced and for those people who think the game is short and easy, there is a piracy mode which is EXTREMELY difficult and will make veterans of the game think outside the box. Overall this game is extremely good and can be replayed over and over again. As I‚Äôm writing this review I have 10 companies fully finished and I‚Äôm working on my 11th and I haven‚Äôt gotten bored once. The achievements in the game also give people another thing to do on top of the countless of things to be explored in the game from Easter eggs, to game combinations and research. This game is countless months of fun for a day‚Äôs work. And to top it all off, there are no in app purchases and ads! Something that not many games can say. This game is definitely worth it and I thank the developers for making a game that I have enjoyed for months on end.
